typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	debtorcode as string ("321197"),
	filenametick as string ("637636856972825204")
}
source(output(
		cdcollijst as integer,
		cddeb as integer,
		cdprodukt as long,
		cdstandeenhd as string,
		{omschr-35} as string,
		cduac as long,
		DEPRICATED as string,
		BLOCKED as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'csvexport',
	fileName: 'productsperdebtorcode',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> ProductListPerDebtor
source(output(
		availablestock as short,
		productcode as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: 'csvexport',
	folderPath: (concat($debtorcode,"/",$filenametick,"/mergedstockfile")),
	fileName: 'stock.json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> MergedStocklistPerDebtor
ProductListPerDebtor, MergedStocklistPerDebtor join(toString(cdprodukt) == toString(productcode),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'csvexport',
	folderPath: (concat($debtorcode,"/",$filenametick,"/output")),
	truncate: true,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['productsStockperdebtorcode.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
